1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Let's <break time='200ms'/> play <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> game. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>He/she <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> from <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

4.text: He /she is His / her hobby is…
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>He <break time='200ms'/> /she <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> His <break time='200ms'/> / <break time='200ms'/> her <break time='200ms'/> hobby <break time='200ms'/> is… <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>This <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> my <break time='200ms'/> friend, <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='ruwani'>Ruwani</phoneme>. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

7.text: She is from Kalutara. She is ten years old. Her hobby is reading books. She likes ice-cream.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>She <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> from <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='kalutara'>Kalutara</phoneme>. <break time='200ms'/> She <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> ten <break time='200ms'/> years <break time='200ms'/> old. <break time='200ms'/> Her <break time='200ms'/> hobby <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> reading <break time='200ms'/> books. <break time='200ms'/> She <break time='200ms'/> likes <break time='200ms'/> ice-cream. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.text: Get the students to stand up and move around. Ask them to talk to a friend and share personal information as given above. Get them to introduce his/her friend. Add more information.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Get <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> students <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> stand <break time='200ms'/> up <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> move <break time='200ms'/> around. <break time='200ms'/> Ask <break time='200ms'/> them <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> talk <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> friend <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> share <break time='200ms'/> personal <break time='200ms'/> information <break time='200ms'/> as <break time='200ms'/> given <break time='200ms'/> above. <break time='200ms'/> Get <break time='200ms'/> them <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> introduce <break time='200ms'/> his/her <break time='200ms'/> friend. <break time='200ms'/> Add <break time='200ms'/> more <break time='200ms'/> information. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
